snippet.title: The red hat - Point and click adventure trailer
snippet.description:
"The red hat" is a point and click-short-mistery-adventure. Follow Thomas in his journey to find out what is hidden at the White Forest. The red hat is the first game of Don Quixote Entertainment: a one person studio based in Spain. 

Made for learning purposes and released for free download!!

Download it for free at:
http://www.indiedb.com/games/the-red-hat/downloads/the-red-hat-full-game-v10

Music credit: "Evie Gloom" by Ian Alex Mac licensed under a CC 3.0  Attribution License. http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Ian_Alex_Mac/Cues/Evie_Gloom_
